edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.util

Class DTUHypothesis<TK,FV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.util.Hypothesis<TK,FV>
      • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.util.DTUHypothesis<TK,FV>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State<Hypothesis<TK,FV>>, Comparable<Hypothesis<TK,FV>>

    public class DTUHypothesis<TK,FV>
extends Hypothesis<TK,FV>
    Hypothesis with words that still need to be added to the partial translation (aka, "pending phrases").
    Author:
    Michel Galley

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DTUHypothesis.PendingPhrase<TK,FV>
      This class represents a phrase with one or more discontinuities in its target side.

      • isDone

        public boolean isDone()
        Hypothesis is "done" when the following conditions are met. (a) The number of untranslated tokens must be zero, the number of "pending" phrases should be zero, and the hypothesis should be unexpired.
